name: @utopian/visca
description: Advanced nodejs library for working with VISCA-based PTZ cameras over IP and over serial connections.

scripts.preversion: echo ordinarily we would execute this... npm test
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && rm -rf build/temp
scripts.publish: npm version patch && npm publish --access public

author: Jeff Mikels
